About

Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.

Khaled Zaky

Technical Product Manager|Software Engineer|TechGeek

I describe myself as an innovative and self-motivated individual passionate about technology and software. My unique skills and think-outside-the-box approach play a significant role in my ability to bridge the gap between technology and businesses. My strongest skill is working well with customers and understanding what problems the product is intended to solve. I have a great ability motivate my peers to achieve favorable results for complex initiatives.

I currently work for one of the big banks in Canada to define the cloud strategy and articulate the product vision from the highest levels of executive leadership to development and implementation teams. Prior to working in the financial sector, I managed an entire set of cloud products for the biggest telecommunications provider in Canada.
